Work specifications:
 
T 21 – Wingnut of LBI TPO (No.387) 2007   R back from Emergency stairs
 

 X 4 Limes (T14, T13, T11, T7) X3 Wingnuts ( T5, T4 & T22) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.387) 2007
Crown lift by the removal of secondary branches only, to a maximum height of 6m above ground level over the highway and 3.5m above ground level over the footpath. 

 X 2 Limes (T15 & T16) X3 Wingnut (T6, T2, T30 & T33) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.387) 2007
Prune back from the elevation of the property to give a clearance of up to 2.5m to facilitate window cleaning
 
X2 Wingnuts (T1 & T20) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.387) 2007
Prune back from the elevation of the property to give a clearance of up to 2.5m to facilitate window cleaning
Crown lift by the removal of secondary branches only, to a maximum height of 6m above ground level over the highway and 3.5m above ground level over the footpath. 

X1 Wingnuts (T9) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.387) 2007
Prune back from the bus stop to give a clearance of up to 1.5m.
